attributes.additional_details: wefare reform, DLA to be replaced by PIP,it appears ATOS may be in the frame for the assessments,it is believed thousands of disabled people will have their cars re possessed,this may lead to many people becoming house bound and no longer be able to get to work for those who have a job.It may also have a wider implication for Motability and the motor industry.We need to halt this immoral attack on the sick and vulnerable people of this country please sign Petition
